Attacks.Name: Water Gun
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character is pushed away S distance from Squirtle.

Attacks.Name: Bubble
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character gains the Slow special condition, reducing their movement by S during their next activation.

Attacks.Name: Hydro Pump
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals damage to all characters (friend and foe) within range 1 of the target character.

Superpowers.Name: Shell Defense
Superpowers.Effect: Add 2 dice to Squirtle's defense rolls until the start of its next activation.

Superpowers.Name: Withdraw
Superpowers.Effect: Squirtle removes all special conditions on it and gains 2 power. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Attacks.Name: Aqua Tail
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Stun special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Rapid Spin
Superpowers.Effect: Squirtle immediately makes a move action. During this move, it can move through characters and terrain without penalty.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Wartortle character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
